profile:
Welcome to The Monitoring Center. We offer Affordable ... Dependable ... Full Service Alarm Monitoring 24/7 starting at ONLY $9.99/month... 6 Month FREE Sign Up Bonus.  ULC Listed and CSAA 5 Diamond Rated Alarm 
Monitoring Facility. We provide new installations, system upgrades & add ons, and full service. We specialise in converting existing alarm systems to our monitoring facility while saving you money.
service_area: Brampton, Concord, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Thornhill, Toronto, Unionville, Vaughan, Woodbridge
hours: 24 hours per day/7 days per week
products:
